reviews.review_msg: Great as a person, as a teacher you have been warned. Have had previous classes with him that went ok, but this semester was a bit of a disaster. 3/4 of the class failed the midterm, tested on "what we learned in class" but seminars were all over the place and no PPTs. If possible, I would take another class; course material re-used and unclear.

Overall average prof. Somewhat disorganized, though knew material pretty well and explained things well (though perhaps too much, since he speaks very quickly). Very willing to help and encouraging during office hours. He should learn students names--got impression teaching for him is a job, but researching is really what he'd prefer to be doing.

Bad prof! Although he is very competent in his field, he is horrible at communicating info, unorganized (uses only slides from fren270-which doesn't exist anymore. midterm average=40%, tests do not reflect what we learned. Was never at his office hours, was not helpful over emails. I would never recommend him to anyone.
